abstract.para: A dataset containing all occurrences available in GBIF matching the query: { "TaxonKey" : [ "is Amblyomma americanum Linnaeus, 1758" ] } The dataset includes records from the following constituent datasets. The full metadata for each constituent is also included in this archive: 1 records from Invertebrate Zoology Division, Yale Peabody Museum 1 records from Naturalis Biodiversity Center (NL) - Chelicerata and Myriapoda 1 records from Denver Museum of Nature & Science - Arachnology 1 records from Canadian Museum of Nature Parasite Collection 1 records from IZIKO South Africa Museum Collection (1800-2013) 2 records from UAM Insect Collection (Arctos) 2 records from Harold W. Manter Laboratory of Parasitology Collection 2 records from CNAC/Coleccion Nacional de Acaros 2 records from University of Alberta E. H. Strickland Entomological Museum (UASM) 2 records from Texas Tech University - Invertebrate Zoology 2 records from CAS Entomology (ENT) 2 records from Recent Invertebrates Specimens 3 records from Museum of Comparative Zoology, Harvard University 4 records from Fiocruz/CAVAISC - Coleção de Artrópodes Vetores Ápteros de Importância em Saúde das Comunidades 8 records from Computarización de la Colección de insectos y ácaros de importancia médica de la Facultad de Ciencias Biológicas, Universidad Autónoma de Nuevo León 9 records from Essig Museum of Entomology 10 records from Brigham Young University Arthropod Museum 11 records from Geographically tagged INSDC sequences 12 records from University of Delaware Insect Research Collection 31 records from International Barcode of Life project (iBOL) 41 records from Illinois Natural History Survey Insect Collection 46 records from Ohio State Acarology Laboratory (OSAL), Ohio State University 101 records from BugGuide - Identification, Images, & Information For Insects, Spiders & Their Kin For the United States & Canada 1015 records from iNaturalist Research-grade Observations
